Clickcloudit.com a Space Tech, inc Company. 

Please check out our FAQ page for a more complete information about us: [FAQ](https://www.clickcloudit.com/faq/)

The following plans are available including windows (plan 3 and up) at no extra charge.

We developed our very own full fledged cloud infrastructure designed with you in mind!

Key Advantages: 

- Hourly Billing
- Deploy in seconds, online 24/7
- Automatic Backups
- Snapshots
- User Friendly Control Panel
- 100% SSD/NVME
- Cloudlet live stats
- Free Windows 2012/2016 on plans 3 and up
- 100% KVM

Cloudlet 1

- 1 CPU Core
- 20GB - SSD DISK
- 1TB - DATA TRANSFER
- 786MB / RAM
- Price - $0.004/h or $2.88/m
- [Order Now](https://www.clickcloudit.com/signup)

Cloudlet 2

- 1 CPU Core
- 30GB - SSD DISK
- 2TB - DATA TRANSFER
- 1GB / RAM
- Price - $0.006/h or $4.32/m
- [Order Now](https://www.clickcloudit.com/signup)


We accept Credit Cards, Paypal, Bitcoin and Ethereum through CoinBase

Coupon Code: During setup of your billing please use code: LET1. Add $10 and get $10 on us!
